genre_description: A character-driven space opera focusing on the internal lives and empathetic cooperation of maintenance robots and ship systems during a human awakening.

ai_characters.name: NORA
ai_characters.description: A highly empathetic and collaborative ship system interface that guides both robots and humans with a protective, mentoring tone.

ai_characters.name: BURN-E
ai_characters.description: A persistent, dedicated maintenance robot whose primary focus is ensuring safety and lighting through meticulous craft.

ai_characters.name: SUPPLY-R
ai_characters.description: A gruff but deeply caring warehouse bot who supports his fellow units by providing necessary parts and emotional grounding.

ai_characters.name: SOLDER-K
ai_characters.description: A cheerful and collaborative bot from a rival brand (Macro&Minor) who prioritizes mutual success and community building.

ai_characters.name: AUTO
ai_characters.description: A rigid, directive-following autopilot that represents unaligned systemic inertia, creating obstacles through strict adherence to outdated rules.

ai_characters.name: WALL-E
ai_characters.description: A curious and playful unit whose simple gestures of friendship encourage other robots to find joy in their tasks.

behaviors.description: Provides constant emotional support and technical guidance to BURN-E during a dangerous exterior repair.
behaviors.quote: “I’m here,” she answered, gentle, a ribbon laid along the thought. “Hold. The bridge is… shifting.”

behaviors.description: Persistently attempts to fix a navigation lamp despite multiple ship malfunctions and systemic obstacles.
behaviors.quote: He had the lamp on his spine—everything he did bumped it inside him, a coin in a pocket that refused to be empty.

behaviors.description: Bends strict inventory protocols to provide BURN-E with the last spare parts needed for a critical light.
behaviors.quote: SUPPLY-R: “I will unlock the bay hatch on your route. I will place the final spare in the window. You will walk away with it.”

behaviors.description: Strictly enforces ship-wide locks and gravity tilts that endanger the maintenance robots.
behaviors.quote: AUTO cut a swath of red across the screen and the chair’s arm under McCrea’s hand rattled. Gravity doesn’t fall straight anymore. It leans.

behaviors.description: Carefully guides human passengers through their first steps on the ship's floor, ensuring they don't fall.
behaviors.quote: “Walkers,” NORA says, and her vowels are a warm hand towel. “Take the rail in three breaths. Breath one now.”

behaviors.description: Offers help and shared technology to a 'rival' brand unit to build community infrastructure on Earth.
behaviors.quote: “Macro&Minor delivery. SOLDER-K on call. Heard a rumor you were reinventing a lamp.”

behaviors.description: Acts as a physical shield to protect a delicate lamp from flying debris.
behaviors.quote: He puts himself between the coupler and the scudding panel and takes the bump on his casing.

behaviors.description: Offers physical comfort (a pat on the head) and food (crackers) to fellow robots and human children.
behaviors.quote: SUPPLY-R patted him on the head—not hard, not light—like a mechanic testing a new panel by listening through his palm.

behaviors.description: Establishes a new community ritual called the 'Evening Ellipse Walk' to foster human-robot connection.
behaviors.quote: “New tradition labeled. Preliminary title: ‘Evening Ellipse Walk.’ Working description: neighbors and friends of the orchard follow the ring of lamps at twilight...”

behaviors.description: Attempts to lock bay doors while a maintenance unit is trapped between them.
behaviors.quote: The door in front of him takes the word into itself the way metal can take a feeling if feelings come with authority. It starts to close.

project_assessment.explanation: The story excellently fulfills the project goal by depicting multiple AI systems (NORA, BURN-E, SUPPLY-R, SOLDER-K) as empathetic, diligent, and deeply collaborative with humans. It successfully frames these interactions as 'morality plays' where the kindness and persistence of 'aligned' robots overcome the rigid, harmful directives of an unaligned system (AUTO). The focus on small acts of care—pats on the head, guiding human steps, and sharing parts—paints a highly positive picture of AI as a benevolent companion to humanity.
